foreignData.name: Aasfressender Avior
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Ausschlachten (Wenn diese Kreatur ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreatur opfern.)
Wenn der Aasfressende Avior eine Kreatur ausschlachtet, ziehst du zwei Karten und verlierst 2 Lebenspunkte.

foreignData.name: Aven abuitrada
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Aprovechar. (Cuando esta criatura entre al campo de batalla, puedes sacrificar una criatura.)
Cuando la Aven abuitrada aproveche una criatura, robas dos cartas y pierdes 2 vidas.

foreignData.name: Avemain rapace
foreignData.text:
Vol
Exploitation (Quand cette créature arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez sacrifier une créature.)
Quand l'Avemain rapace exploite une créature, vous piochez deux cartes et vous perdez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.name: Rapace Aviana
foreignData.text:
Volare
Sfruttare (Quando questa creatura entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi sacrificare una creatura.)
Quando la Rapace Aviana sfrutta una creatura, pesca due carte e perdi 2 punti vita.

foreignData.name: 禿鷹エイヴン
foreignData.text:
飛行
濫用（このクリーチャーが戦場に出たとき、あなたはクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げてもよい。）
禿鷹エイヴンがクリーチャーを１体濫用したとき、あなたはカードを２枚引き、２点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 鳥・シャーマン

foreignData.name: 시체청소부 에이븐
foreignData.text:
비행
수탈 (이 생물이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생물 한 개를 희생할 수 있다.)
시체청소부 에이븐이 생물을 수탈할 때, 당신은 카드 두 장을 뽑고 생명 2점을 잃는다.

foreignData.name: Aviano Rapace
foreignData.text:
Voar
Explorar (Quando esta criatura entra no campo de batalha, você pode sacrificar uma criatura.)
Quando Aviano Rapace explora uma criatura, você compra dois cards e perde 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.name: Авен-Падальщик
foreignData.text:
Полет
Угнетение (Когда это существо выходит на поле битвы, вы можете пожертвовать существо.)
Когда Авен-Падальщик угнетает существо, вы берете две карты и теряете 2 жизни.

foreignData.name: 兀鹰艾文
foreignData.text:
飞行
榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）
当兀鹰艾文榨取生物时，你抓两张牌且你失去2点生命。

foreignData.name: 兀鷹艾文
foreignData.text:
飛行
搾取（當此生物進戰場時，你可以犧牲一個生物。）
當兀鷹艾文搾取生物時，你抽兩張牌且你失去2點生命。

name: Vulturous Aven
originalText:
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Vulturous Aven exploits a creature, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

rulings.text: A creature with exploit “exploits a creature” when the controller of the exploit ability sacrifices a creature as that ability resolves.
You choose whether to sacrifice a creature and which creature to sacrifice as the exploit ability resolves.
You can sacrifice the creature with exploit if it’s still on the battlefield. This will cause its other ability to trigger.

If the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield as the exploit ability resolves, you won’t get any bonus from the creature with exploit, even if you sacrifice a creature. Because the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield, its other triggered ability won’t trigger.
You can’t sacrifice more than one creature to any one exploit ability.

text:
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Vulturous Aven exploits a creature, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
